alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 21 at 4:00AM AKDT until April 23 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT AKDT SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches. Winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Northeastern Brooks Range in passes. * WHEN...From 4 PM Friday to midnight AKDT Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow are expected to develop Friday afternoon. Strong north winds will develop in passes Friday afternoon and continue into Saturday night. Snow will taper off Saturday night and visibility will improve slightly.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
